name: Bananas Foster
author: Shirley Drury
instructions: Slice bananas in half lengthwise. Brush with lemon juice. Melt sugar and butter in flat chafing dish or 10 inch skillet. Add bananas, saute until just tender. Sprinkle with cinnamon. Remove from heat; add liqueur and rum. Immediately ignite and baste bananas with warm liquid until flame burns out. Divide sauce and bananas over 4 servings of ice cream.
